title: FIFA 19 Turtle Repack Poll
body: Thanks to a guy named Razor12911, decryption and re-encryption of FIFA 19 files is now possible. But there is a huge problem. Game developers used a very slow compression on game archives. It’s so slow, that installing of the 22-23 GB repack would take ~4 hours on 8-threads CPU and ~8 hours on 4-threads CPU. Since I already have Monkey Repack of FIFA 19 available, I want to know if I should invest my time to a Turtle Repack at all. So, here is the poll.
